verbs.description: [ARG0: russian historians] [V: use] [ARG1: nazi photo] [ARG2: to locate stalin - era mass graves] a team of russian historians and archaeologists have used a nazi bomber pilot photograph to help them pinpoint the location of mass graves in moscow containing the remains of thousands shot by stalin secret police estonia mongolian government roman romanov ussr mass graves soviet union mongolia butovo nkvd donskoye cemetery kommunarka sergei bondarenko moscow director kgb genrikh yagoda president 1937 - 41 president vladimir putin yan rachinsky official stalin gulag history museum baltic
